attributes.action: improve the welfare of pets, wild animals and animals in food and other industries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Animals are mainly only different to humans in physical apearance. They have emotions like humans and in most cases are a lot more innocent than humans. Yet some people and industries treat them very badly.

This petition calls for new actions to be taken to by the government improve the physical and mental welfare of all animals in the United Kingdom. Which will hopefully set an example for the EU and the world.
